parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type as defined in swHemTypes_e

parameters.name: Position
parameters.description: Position as defined in swHemPositionTypes_e

parameters.name: Reverse
parameters.description: True reverses the direction, false does not

parameters.name: DLength
parameters.description: Hem length; valid only for open or closed hems

parameters.name: DGap
parameters.description: Gap distance; valid only for open hems

parameters.name: DAngle
parameters.description: Hem angle; valid only for tear-drop or rolled hems

parameters.name: DRad
parameters.description: Hem radius; valid only for tear-drop or rolled hems

parameters.name: DMiterGap
parameters.description: Hem miter gap

parameters.name: PCBA
parameters.description: If... Then... non-NULL Pointer to ICustomBendAllowance object for which required values have been set NULL Parent bend's bend allowance is used

parameters.name: UseDefaultRelief
parameters.description: True to use the default relief, false to use the relief specified by ReliefType

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Type of relief as defined in swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e ; valid only if UseDefaultRelief is false

parameters.name: ReliefTearTypes
parameters.description: Type of relief tear as defined in swReliefTearTypes_e ; valid only when: UseDefaultRelief is false - and - ReliefType is swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefTear

parameters.name: UseReliefRatio
parameters.description: True to use ReliefRatio, false to use ReliefWidth/ReliefDepth; valid only when: UseDefaultRelief is false - and - ReliefType is either swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefObround or swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefRectangular

parameters.name: ReliefRatio
parameters.description: Relief ratio; valid only when: UseDefaultRelief is false - and - UseReliefRatio is true - and - ReliefType is either swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefObround or swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefRectangular

parameters.name: ReliefWidth
parameters.description: Width of the relief; valid only when: UseDefaultRelief is false - and - UseReliefRatio is false - and - ReliefType is either swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefObround or swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefRectangular

parameters.name: ReliefDepth
parameters.description: Depth of the relief; valid only when: UseDefaultRelief is false - and - UseReliefRatio is false - and - ReliefType is either swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefObround or swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefRectangular

title: IFeatureManager.InsertSheetMetalHem2
description: Inserts a hem of the specified relief type at the selected edges of the current sheet metal part.
signature:
Feature InsertSheetMetalHem2( 
   System.Int32
Type
,
   System.Int32
Position
,
   System.Boolean
Reverse
,
   System.Double
DLength
,
   System.Double
DGap
,
   System.Double
DAngle
,
   System.Double
DRad
,
   System.Double
DMiterGap
,
   CustomBendAllowance
PCBA
,
   System.Boolean
UseDefaultRelief
,
   System.Int32
ReliefType
,
   System.Int32
ReliefTearTypes
,
   System.Boolean
UseReliefRatio
,
   System.Double
ReliefRatio
,
   System.Double
ReliefWidth
,
   System.Double
ReliefDepth
)

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type as defined in swHemTypes_e

parameters.name: Position
parameters.description: Position as defined in swHemPositionTypes_e

parameters.name: Reverse
parameters.description: True reverses the direction, false does not

parameters.name: DLength
parameters.description: Hem length; valid only for open or closed hems

parameters.name: DGap
parameters.description: Gap distance; valid only for open hems

parameters.name: DAngle
parameters.description: Hem angle; valid only for tear-drop or rolled hems

parameters.name: DRad
parameters.description: Hem radius; valid only for tear-drop or rolled hems

parameters.name: DMiterGap
parameters.description: Hem miter gap

parameters.name: PCBA
parameters.description: If... Then... non-NULL Pointer to ICustomBendAllowance object for which required values have been set NULL Parent bend's bend allowance is used

parameters.name: UseDefaultRelief
parameters.description: True to use the default relief, false to use the relief specified by ReliefType

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Type of relief as defined in swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e ; valid only if UseDefaultRelief is false

parameters.name: ReliefTearTypes
parameters.description: Type of relief tear as defined in swReliefTearTypes_e ; valid only when: UseDefaultRelief is false - and - ReliefType is swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefTear

parameters.name: UseReliefRatio
parameters.description: True to use ReliefRatio, false to use ReliefWidth/ReliefDepth; valid only when: UseDefaultRelief is false - and - ReliefType is either swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefObround or swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefRectangular

parameters.name: ReliefRatio
parameters.description: Relief ratio; valid only when: UseDefaultRelief is false - and - UseReliefRatio is true - and - ReliefType is either swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefObround or swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefRectangular

parameters.name: ReliefWidth
parameters.description: Width of the relief; valid only when: UseDefaultRelief is false - and - UseReliefRatio is false - and - ReliefType is either swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefObround or swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefRectangular

parameters.name: ReliefDepth
parameters.description: Depth of the relief; valid only when: UseDefaultRelief is false - and - UseReliefRatio is false - and - ReliefType is either swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefObround or swSheetMetalReliefTypes_e .swSheetMetalReliefRectangular

remarks:
Before calling this method:
Call
IFeatureManager::CreateCustomBendAllowance
to create an instance of ICustomBendAllowance.
Initialize the CustomBendAllowance object.
Assign PCBA to the initialized CustomBendAllowance object.
Select one or more edges in the sheet metal model to which to add the specified hem.
